channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for RI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for RI

item.title: Report X-2023090706
item.description:
Report X-2023090706

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-27T18:15:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-12
  • City: WARWICK
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER ARRIVED AT LOATION AND DISCOVERED PACKAGE WITH A CORROSIVE DIAMOND LABEL, SHIPPING PAPERS, UN#, UNSPEC#, ORIENTATION ARROWS. THE PACKAGE WAS WET. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE AND PROCESSED THE LEAKING PACKAGE THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report I-2023090146
item.description:
Report I-2023090146

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-19
  • City: Kalmazoo
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FERRELLGAS
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Bobtail was struck by other vehicle that crossed the center line.Bobtail is in a ditch on its side. The driver o the OV was injured and taken to a local hospital. Our Employee was not injured. Our Truck was flared off and was up righted around 11:30 last night. Residents that had been evacuated were allowed back in around 10:30 pm.
